subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] anyone else?
author: Rj
full_text:
--0-369268848-1250088222=:18096
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

It seems like a couple possibilities:

1) The predictions are accurate, yet=
 the people getting them are not putting together and distributing a statem=
ent warning the world, to perhaps save the lives of some that take precauti=
ons (Like, east coasters, etc).=A0 In this case these researchers lives wil=
l be ruined=A0 when it is discovered that they knew what was going to happe=
n but were silent (not to mention what kind of people they must be inside t=
o not have at least tried to help.)

2) The predictions are bogus, and peop=
le are just hearing what they want to hear.=A0 In this case, maybe they'll =
learn whether they really believed in EVPs or not: those who try to distrib=
ute a statement warning the world and are wrong, will learn that what they =
believe is not very accurate.=A0 Those who do not distribute such a warning=
 already know what they are hearing is fake, and so they'll learn something=
 about themselves and their motives (as will those watching their predictio=
ns).

So I think it's a good test of EVPs - but, I think it is also a good =
test of the character of the people recording them.=A0 If they believe ther=
e is disaster on Aug 15, what does it say about them if they do nothing and=
 are silent?=A0 If they are not sure of its accuracy either way, what does =
it say of them that they are silent, when they admit the possibility of dis=
aster and are silent?=A0 And if they dismiss the predictions completely, is=
 there any reason to report the predictions other than ego?

All in all, I'=
d suggest if you do not believe this stuff, stop hearing dates.=A0 People t=
hat predict dates (end of the world etc) get discredited as fringe cults wh=
en those predictions don't arrive.=A0 Instead, hear things like "in the fut=
ure", "in the coming years", etc.=A0 That way, you can predict what you wan=
t, with little accountability.=A0 Or just don't hear predictions.=A0 It's t=
oo risky to a beliefs credibility. 


--- On Wed, 8/12/09, Zack Widup <w9sz=
.zack@...> wrote:

From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...>
Subject: Re=
: [EVP-ITC] anyone else?
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Wednesday, Augus=
t 12, 2009, 7:02 AM






=A0




    
                  So what happens wh=
en the 15th has come to pass and nothing has happened?
=A0
Zack


=A0
On We=
d, Aug 12, 2009 at 8:22 AM, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com> wro=
te:


=A0 




I'm hearing that other forums have stuff about August 12 to =
the 15th, even zetatalk had kind of a sideways reference to the 15th. 
=A0
=
=A0F-S
